owl:Ontology.terms:creator: Javier Lopez Rodriguez
Lucia Sanchez Gonzalez
owl:Ontology.terms:description: Ontology that represents viral infectious diseases, drugs used to treat such diseases, the companies that produce the drugs, and the relation of scientific publications to the drugs and diseases.
owl:Ontology.terms:title: Viral Diseases And Drugs Ontology

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A resource that might provide additional information about the subject resource
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: See also

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relatiion between a whole and one of its parts
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Contains
Contiene

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relation between two things in which one is in some way more general than the other
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Is broader than
es más amplio

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relation between two things in which one is in some way more specific than the other
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Es más específico
Is narrower than

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relation between a text (a paper, a paragraph or a sentece) and one of the entities it speaks of
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Menciona
Mentions

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relation between two entities in which one has an influence on the other
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: affects

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relation between two entities in which one originates the other
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: causes

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relation between the class that represents the n-ary relationship of commercializing a drug with a name in a country; and the commercialized drug.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: commercializes drug

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relation between a pharmaceutical company and the class that represents the n-ary relationship of commercializing a drug with a name in a country.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: commercializes drug with name in country

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relation between the class that represents the n-ary relationship of commercializing a drug with a name in a country; and the country where the drug is commercialized.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: commercializes in country

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relation between a text and one of its paragraphs
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: contains paragraph

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relation between a text and one of its sentences
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: contains sentence

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relation between two entities in which one destroys or inhibits the other
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: destroys

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relation between a drug and the doctor who gives it as treatment
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: drug given by doctor

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relation between a drug and the pharmaceutical company that commercializes it
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: drug marketed by company

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relation between a doctor and a drug they give as treatment
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: gives drug

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relation in which an organization has a director
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has director

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relation between a company and its headquarters
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has headquarters

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relation between two entities in which one is influenced by the other
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is affected by

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relation between two active substances in which one is in some way more general than the other
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is broader than active substance

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relation between two diseases in which one is in some way more general than the other
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is broader than disease

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relation between two entities in which one is originated by the other
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is caused by

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relation between two entities in which one is destroyed or inhibited by the other
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is destroyed by

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relation in which a person is the director of a company
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is director of company

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relation between a headquarters and a company it belongs to
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is headquarters of company

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relation between an entity of a text and the text that speaks of it
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is mentioned in

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relation between two active substances in which one is in some way more specific than the other
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is narrower than active substance

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relation between two diseases in which one is in some way more specific than the other
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is narrower than disease

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relation between a pharmaceutical company and the drug it commercializes
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: markets drug

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relation between a text and one of the entities it speaks of
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: mentions

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relation between a text and one of the chemical substances it speaks of
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: mentions chemical substance

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relation between a text and one of the disorders it speaks of
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: mentions disorder

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relation between a text and one of the drugs it speaks of
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: mentions drug

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relation between a doctor and the class that represents the n-ary relationship between a doctor that uses a drug to treat a person affected by some disorder; and the respective disorder.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: treats disorder

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relation between a doctor and the class that represents the n-ary relationship between a doctor that uses a drug to treat a person affected by some disorder
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: treats disorder of patient with drug

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relation between a doctor and the class that represents the n-ary relationship between a doctor that uses a drug to treat a person affected by some disorder; and the patient treated.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: treats patient

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relation between a doctor and the class that represents the n-ary relationship between a doctor that uses a drug to treat a person affected by some disorder; and the drug used.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: treats with drug

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A relation between an infectious agent and its name
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: agent name

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A relation between the class that represents the n-ary relationship of commercializing a drug with a name in a country; and the commercial name of the drug
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: commercializes with name

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A relation between a company and its name
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: company name

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An independent unit of the built environment with a characteristic spatial structure, intended to serve at least one function or user activity [ISO 12006-2:2013]. A bot:Building is a part of the physical world or a virtual world that is inherently both located in this world and having a 3D spatial extent, is contained in a building site, and can contain one or more storeys that are vertically connected.
Bir yapılı ortamına sahip, ve karakteri mekansal olan ve en az bir funksiyona veya kullanıcı etkinligini desteleyen bir bağımsız parcadir.

Een onafhankelijke entiteit met een ruimtelijke structuur die onderdeel is van de gebouwde omgeving, en bedoeld is om minimaal één functie of gebruikersactiviteit te bedienen [ISO 12006-2:2013]. Een bot:Building is deel van de fysieke wereld of een virtuele wereld dat zowel gelokaliseerd kan worden in deze wereld als een ruimtelijke omvang heeft, is deel van een gebouwsite, en kan één of meerder verdiepingen bevatten die verticaal verbonden zijn.

Eine eigenständige Einheit der bebauten Umgebung mit einer charakteristischen räumlichen Struktur. Es besteht die Absicht das es eine Funktion oder Nutzung erlaubt [ISO 12006-2:2013]. Ein bot:Building ist Teil der realen und virtuellen Welt und hat eine räumliche Ausdehnung. Es ist enthalten in einem Grundstück und kann ein oder mehrere Stockwerke enthalten, die vertical miteinander verbunden sind.

En oberoende enhet i den byggda miljön med en karaktäristisk rumslig struktur som stödjer minst en funktion eller användaraktivitet. [ISO 12006-2:2013]. En bot:Building är en del av den fysiska världen eller en virtuell värld som har en spatial utsträckning i tre dimensioner, ligger på en plats, och kan ha en eller flera vertikalt förbundna våningar.

En uafhængig enhed i det bebyggede miljø med en karakteristisk rumlig struktur, beregnet til at betjene mindst en funktion eller brugeraktivitet [ISO 12006-2: 2013]. En bot:Building er en del af den fysiske verden eller en virtuel verden, der i sagens natur både er lokaliseret i denne verden og har en 3D rumlig afgrænsning, er indeholdt på et byggefelt og kan indeholde en eller flere etager, der er lodret forbundet.

Nezávislá jednotka v (stavebnom) prostredí či verejnom priestore, s charakteristickou priestorovou štruktúrou a formou, ktorá má slúžiť aspoň pre jednu činnosť alebo funkciu uživateľa [ISO 12006-2:2013]. Bot:Building je súčasťou fyzického alebo virtuálneho sveta, ktorý je neodmyslitelnľ umiestnľný ako vo fyzickom svete, tak má 3D virtuálny priestorový rozsah, je umiestnený na stavenisku ("Site") a môže obsahovať jedno alebo viac podlaží, ktoré sú vertikálne prepojené.

Nezávislá jednotka v (stavebním) prostředí či veřejném prostoru, s charakteristickou prostorovou strukturou a formou, která má sloužit alespoň pro jednu činnost nebo funkci uživatele [ISO 12006-2: 2013]. Bot:Building je součástí fyzického nebo virtuálního světa, který je neodmyslitelně umístěn jak ve fyzickém světě, tak má 3D virtuální prostorový rozsah, je umístěn na staveništi ("Site") a může obsahovat jedno nebo víc podlaží, která jsou vertikálně propojena.

Rakennetun ympäristön itsenäinen osa, jolla on ominainen avaruudellinen rakenne, ja joka on tarkoitettu palvelemaan ainakin yhtä funktiota tai käyttäjäaktiviteettia [ISO 12006-2:2013]. bot:Building on fyysisen tai virtuaalisen maailman osa, joka luonnostaan sekä sijaitsee tässä maailmassa että omaa kolmiulotteiset tilalliset ulottuvuudet, sijaitsee tontilla, ja se voi sisältää yhden tai useamman kerroksen jotka ovat pystysuunnassa yhteydessä.

Uma unidade independente do ambiente construído com uma estrutura espacial característica, destinada a servir pelo menos uma função do utilizador [ISO 12006-2:2013]. Um bot:Building é uma parte do mundo físico ou do mundo virtual que está inerentemente localizado neste mundo e que tem uma extensão espacial tridimensional, que está contido num sítio de construção e que contém um ou mais pisos que estão conectados verticalmente.

Un'unità indipendente dell'ambiente costruito con una struttura spaziale caratteristica, destinato a servire almeno una funzione o attività degli utenti [ISO 12006-2:2013]. Un bot:Building è parte del mondo fisico o virtuale che si trova intrinsecamente in questo mondo e ha una estensione spaziale tridimensionale, è contenuto in un sito e può contenere uno o più piani che sono connessi verticalmente.
Une unité indépendante de l'environnement bâti avec une structure spatiale caractéristique, conçue pour répondre à une fonction ou une activité de l'utilisateur [ISO 12006-2:2013]

Unidad independiente del entorno construido con una estructura espacial característica, destinada a servir al menos una función o actividad del usuario [ISO 12006-2: 2013]. Un bot:Building es tanto una parte del mundo físico o virtual que se encuentra inherentemente situado en este mundo y que tiene una extensión espacial 3D, se encuentra en un emplazamiento de edificación, y puede contener uno o más pisos conectados verticalmente.

Unitat independent de l’entorn construït amb una estructura espacial característica, destinada a servir almenys una funció o activitat de l’usuari [ISO 12006-2: 2013]. Un bot:Building és tant una part del món físic o virtual que es troba inherentment situat en aquest món i que té una extensió espacial 3D, es troba en un emplaçament d’edificació, i pot contenir un o més pisos connectats verticalment.

یک واحد مستقل با ساختار مکانی مشخص از محیط ساخت وساز، که برای ارایه‌ی حداقل یک عملکرد یا فعالیت کاربری در نظرگرفته شده است [ISO 12006-2:2013]. یک bot:Building یک بخش از دنیای فیزیکی یا یک دنیای مجازی است که اساسا در این دنیا قرار دارد و دارای حدود مکانی سه بعدی است، دریک سایت ساختمان قرار گرفته ، و میتواند دربرگیرنده‌ی یک یا چند طبقه باشد که به صورت عمودی به هم متصل شده اند.
具有特定空间结构的建筑环境独立单元，旨在服务至少一种功能或用户活动[ISO 12006-2：2013]。 bot:Building是物理或虚拟世界的一部分，其既存在于其中，又具有3D空间范围。bot:Building包含在建筑工地中，并且可以包含一个或多个垂直连接的楼层。
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Bina
Budova
Budova
Building
Byggnad
Bygning
Bâtiment
Edifici
Edificio
Edificio
Edifício

Gebäude

ساختمان
建筑
Building

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: substance that kills or slows the growth of microorganisms, including bacteria, viruses, fungi and protozoans
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Antimicrobial Agent
antimicrobial agent

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: agent used for treating infections caused by retrovirus
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Antiretroviral
antiretroviral

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: agent used for treating infections caused by virus
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Antiviral
antiviral

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: unicellular microorganisms from the domain Bacteria
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Bacteria
bacteria

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: entity that represents an association of people (natural, legal or both) with a specific objective
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Company
company

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: person who leads a company
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Director
director

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: person who practices medicine professionally
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Doctor
doctor

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: an infection that is located outside of the cells (such as in the blood)
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Extracellular Infection
extracellular infection

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: group of organisms from the kingdom Fungi that include unicellular microorganisms such as yeasts and molds, as well as multicellular organisms such as mushrooms
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Fungi
fungi

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: double-stranded DNA virus, belonging to group I of Baltimore classification
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Group I
group i

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: single-stranded DNA virus, belonging to group II of Baltimore classification
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Group I I
group ii

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: double-stranded RNA virus, belonging to group III of Baltimore classification
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Group I I I
group iii

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: positive-sense single stranded RNA virus, belonging to group IV of Baltimore classification
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Group I V
group iv

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: negative-sense single stranded RNA virus, belonging to group V of Baltimore classification
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Group V
group v

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: single-stranded RNA reverse transcriptase virus, belonging to group VI of Baltimore classification
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Group V I
group vi

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: double-stranded DNA reverse transcriptase virus, belonging to group VII of Baltimore classification
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Group V I I
group vii

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: central home of an company
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Headquarters
headquarters

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: invasion of and multiplication in a host by disease-causing pathogens or organisms
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Infection
infection

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: biological entity, typically an infectious microorganism or agent (such as virus, bacterium, protozoan, prion or fungus) that causes disease in its host
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Infectious Agent
infectious agent

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: disease caused by an infection
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Infectious Disease
infectious disease

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: an infection that is located inside of the cells
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Intracellular Infection
intracellular infection

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: microorganism; microscopic living organism
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Microbe
microbe

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: the class that represents the n-ary relationship of commercializing a drug with a name in a country
owl:Class.rdfs:label: N Ary Commercial Drug Info
n-ary commercial drug info

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: the class that represents the n-ary relationship between a doctor that uses a drug to treat a person affected by some disorder
owl:Class.rdfs:label: N Ary Treatment Info
n-ary treatment info

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: company in the pharmaceutical industry
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Pharmaceutical Company
pharmaceutical company

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: protein infectious particle; pathogenic type of misfolded protein
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Prion
prion

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: unicellular, animal-like microorganisms, sometimes parasitic
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Protozoa
protozoa

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: group of viruses that have a reverse transcription step in their viral cycle
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Retrovirus
retrovirus

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: an infection caused by a virus
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Viral Infection
viral infection

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: presence of virus in the blood
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Viremia
viremia

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: non-cellular, submicroscopic infectious agent that replicates only inside the living cells of an organism
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Virus
virus
